1.text: Buy leaves that are a bright, dark green color.

2.text: Remove the curry leaves from the stems and rinse them in cool water.

3.text: Heat 1 to 2 US tbsp (15 to 30 mL) of cooking oil over medium-high heat.

4.text: Sauté the curry leaves for 3 to 5 minutes until they’re crisp.

5.text: Cook the rest of your dish with the curry leaves to infuse it with flavor.

6.text: Set the sautéd leaves to the side to use as a finishing seasoning.

7.text: Mix curry leaves, mustard seeds, and coconut for a traditional flavor.

8.text: Cook a rice dish with sautéd curry leaves to infuse it with flavor.

9.text: Pair your vegetable sides with curry leaves to add a lemon essence.

10.text: Complement curries with curry leaves to infuse them with freshness.

11.text: Bake an aromatic loaf of bread by adding chopped curry leaves.

12.text: Make a chutney to add to many dishes for an instant infusion of flavor.
